responses: 2: There is self-censorship on a few highly sensitive political issues but not on moderately
3: There is little or no self-censorship among journalists.
citation: Pemstein et al. (2018, V-Dem Working Paper Series 2018:21); V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
question: Is there self-censorship among journalists when reporting on issues that the government considers politically sensitive?
